channel.title: Wireless Principles - David Vargas
channel.description: This chapter covers the following exam topics: 1.0 Network Fundamentals 1.1 Explain the role and function of network components 1.1.d Access Points 1.11 Describe wireless principles 1.11.a Nonoverlapping Wi-Fi channels 1.11.b SSID 1.11.c RF Comparing Wired and Wireless Networks Wireless devices must adhere to a common standard (IEEE 802.11). Wireless coverage must exist in the area where devices are expected to use it. Wireless LAN Topologies IEEE 802.11 WLANs are always half duplex because transmissions between stations use the same frequency or channel.
